00029 #include <iostream>
00030 
00031 #include "Timer.hpp"
00032 #include "LogFile.hpp"
00033 
00034 time_t Timer::StartTime;
00035 
00036 void Timer::Reset()
00037 {
00038     StartTime = std::clock();
00039 }
00040 
00041 void Timer::Print(std::string message)
00042 {
00043     double time = (std::clock() - StartTime)/(CLOCKS_PER_SEC+0.0); //0.0 is to ensure double division
00044     std::cout << message << " time: " << time << "s\n" << std::flush;
00045     LOG(2,"    " << message << " time: "<< time <<"s");
00046 }
00047 
00048 void Timer::PrintAndReset(std::string message)
00049 {
00050     Print(message);
00051     Reset();
00052 }
